items.title: Visual Studio Code
items.description: Visual Studio Code is a lightweight but powerful source code editor.

items.title: Affinity Photo
items.description: Powerful photo editing software used by professionals worldwide.

items.title: Affinity Designer
items.description: Affinity Designer is a vector graphics editor.

items.title: Vue
items.description: Is an open-source model–view–viewmodel front end JavaScript framework for building user interfaces and single-page applications.

items.title: Vite
items.description: Is a new breed of frontend build tooling that significantly improves the frontend development.

items.title: Heroku
items.description: Heroku is a platform as a service (PaaS) that enables developers to build, run, and operate applications entirely in the cloud.

items.title: Digital Ocean
items.description: DigitalOcean, Inc. is an American cloud infrastructure provider.

items.title: Mongo DB
items.description: MongoDB is a document database with the scalability and flexibility that you want with the querying and indexing that you need.

items.title: Neo4J
items.description: Neo4j is an open-source, NoSQL, native graph database that provides an ACID-compliant transactional backend for your applications.
